snippet: A software glitch involving the new health care law may mean that some smokers won’t bear the full brunt of tobacco-user penalties that could have made their premiums much higher, at least for the first year.
abstract: A software glitch involving the new health care law may mean that some smokers won’t bear the full brunt of tobacco-user penalties that could have made their premiums much higher, at least for the first year.

headline.main: Computer Snag Limits Insurance Penalties on Smokers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
